index.js(2,17): error TS2721: Cannot invoke an object which is possibly 'null'.


==== index.js (1 errors) ====
    (function(require, module, exports){
        const mod = require("./mod");
                    ~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2721: Cannot invoke an object which is possibly 'null'.
